attributes.action: All vehicles in UK should have number plates in English not any other language.
attributes.background: Many vehicles in areas like Mayfair and Knightsbridge are often seen breaking traffic rules, creating public nuisance or rash driving but as their number plates are not in English which makes it difficult to report the owner or possible incident in public interest.

rejection.details:
Vehicles with number plates which display numbers or letters that aren’t identifiable in the UK are already required to have a temporary Q number plate. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/importing-vehicles-into-the-uk/temporary-imports
